title: Salesforce Data Analyst Salary Guide 2024 | Complete Compensation Data
meta_description: Comprehensive guide to Salesforce Data Analyst salaries: $65K-$160K+ in USA. Learn about experience-based pay, bonuses, certifications & skills needed. Updated for 2024.
